title: Investors Go Back to Their Early-Covid-19 Playbook: Buy Zoom and Peloton, Dump Travel
sub_head: Work-from-home companies and Clorox rose, while cruise lines slumped
body:
It was like early 2020 all over again in the stock market Friday.
Major indexes sold off, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average suffering its worst day in a year, on fears of a fast-spreading new variant of the coronavirus. Investors returned to their early-pandemic playbooks for which companies could be expected to struggle or thrive.
